#summary Project history and credits.

= Changelog =

*2008-11-20*
  * Added TinyMCE compressor support.

*2008-09-10*:
  * Released version 1.0.

*2008-08-24*:
  * Added link and image list support.

*2008-08-21*:
  * Moved to Google Code.

= Credits =

`tinymce` was written by [http://joost.cassee.net/ Joost Cassee] based on the work by John D'Agostino. It was partly taken from [http://code.djangoproject.com/wiki/CustomWidgetsTinyMCE his code at the Django code wiki].

The TinyMCE compressor was written by [http://www.jasondavies.com/ Jason Davies] based on the [http://wiki.moxiecode.com/index.php/TinyMCE:Compressor PHP TinyMCE compressor] from [http://www.moxiecode.com/ MoxieCode].
